attributes.action: Add yellow lines on Institute road where it meets Mount avenue and Mount Street
attributes.background: as many of you are aware of the dangerous parking around the top mount avenue, in my option there will be a serious accident there in the near future, i have a letter from bradford city council and they are not willing to put yellow lines there.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local roads are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor

Your local council also has a petitions system:

http://www.bradford.gov.uk/bmdc/Consultations/epetitions
